name: Digital Pioneers
title: Most Connected Nation
description: In 2023, Bahrain achieved a remarkable milestone with 100% of its population, both male and female, using the internet, showcasing its commitment to digital connectivity.

name: Water Scarcity Challenge
title: Lowest Freshwater Resources
description: Bahrain faces significant water scarcity, with only 0.004 billion cubic meters of renewable internal freshwater resources available in 2021, one of the lowest globally.

name: Tax Haven
title: Minimal Tax Burden
description: In 2020, Bahrain's taxes on income, profits, and capital gains were notably low, amounting to just 6,637,382.119 in local currency units, reflecting its favorable tax environment.

name: Safe Haven
title: Lowest Homicide Rate
description: With an intentional homicide rate of just 0.068 per 100,000 people in 2021, Bahrain stands out as one of the safest countries in the world.

name: Health Guardians
title: Universal Tetanus Protection
description: Bahrain achieved a 100% vaccination rate against tetanus for newborns in 2023, ensuring comprehensive health protection for its youngest citizens.

name: Resource Importers
title: High Ores and Metals Imports
description: In 2023, ores and metals constituted 20.47% of Bahrain's merchandise imports, highlighting its reliance on these resources for industrial needs.

name: Vocational Gender Gap
title: Low Female Vocational Enrollment
description: In 2018, only 8.13% of female students were enrolled in vocational secondary education, indicating a gender disparity in vocational training opportunities.

name: Efficient Economy
title: Competitive PPP Conversion Factor
description: With a PPP conversion factor of 0.173 in 2023, Bahrain demonstrates a competitive economic environment, facilitating international trade and investment.

name: Fertilizer Efficiency
title: Minimal Fertilizer Consumption
description: In 2022, Bahrain's fertilizer consumption was only 0.06% of its production, reflecting efficient agricultural practices and minimal environmental impact.
